titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Peter A. Long papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Peter A. Long was the attorney for the Ann Arbor Economic Development Corporation, organized by the city in 1978 to support new business and industry in the city through the issuance of tax-exempt bonds. Tax law changes in 1986 removed much of the corporation's ability to provide development funding.
archdesc.scopecontent: Reference file, mainly clippings and legal notices, along with a manual for applicants.

corpname.primary_name: Economic Development Corporation of Ann Arbor
